ygData.subject: Interesting Giant in Warsliks Woods (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Was hunting Forest Giants in Warsliks Woods this weekend and ran into an unusual one.  As you may know most of them are typed, for example Forest Giant
ygData.messageBody:
Was hunting Forest Giants in Warsliks Woods this weekend and ran into an
unusual one. As you may know most of them are typed, for example Forest
Giant Evergreen, Forest Giant Greenwood, Forest Giant Sapling, etc. This
one was A Forest Giant. When he attacked in addition to the usual "I hate
Wood Elves" there was some interesting text.
S
P
O
I
L
E
R
S
P
A
C
E
S
P
O
I
L
E
R
S
P
A
C
E
When attacking you got the following test message.
"The forest giant covers up a pouch as if to not let something out"
He then said.
"You not get lizard, you get squished!"
He didn't drop anything interesting so this may require a rogue or may be
part of a quest in some other way. Anyone have any ideas?

Kit
